flawed_nl_solution:
Pulling a loaded sled at 10 mph for 180 miles takes 180/10=<<180/10=18.0>>18.0 hours
Pulling an unloaded sled at 20 mph for 120 miles takes 120/20=<<120/20=6.0>>6.0 hours
Pulling a loaded sled at 10 mph for 80 miles takes 80/10=<<80/10=8.0>>8.0 hours
Pulling an unloaded sled at 20 mph for 140 miles takes 140/20=<<140/20=7.0>>7.0 hours
In total, Toby will have pulled the sled for 18.0+6.0+8.0+7.0=<<18.0+6.0+8.0+7.0=93.0>>93.0 hours

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 39.0, not 93.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
